history.proof: intros. unfold Coh, valid, PCM.valid in *. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
w: world
s: state

Goal:
Coh w s -> valid s

Premises:
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
Notation valid := @PCM.valid
cohW : forall (w : world) (s : state), Coh w s -> valid w
post_valid : forall s : soup, valid s -> forall m : msg TaggedMessage, valid (post_msg s m).1
seq_last_in : forall (A : eqType) (s : seq A) (x : A), last x s \notin s -> s = [::]
consume_msg = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => match find id s with | Some m => upd id (mark_msg m) s | None => s end : soup -> mid -> soup
hook_complete = fun w : world => hooks_consistent w w : world -> Prop
post_msg = fun (s : soup) (m : msg TaggedMessage) => (s \+ fresh s \\-> m, fresh s) : soup -> msg TaggedMessage -> soup * mid
Mem = fun (T : Type) (pT : PredType T) => nosimpl (let '@PropPredType _ Pred_Sort0 toPred s as pT0 := pT return (pT0 -> Mem_Pred T) in let '@exist _ _ mem _ as s0 := s return (PropPredType s0 -> Mem_Pred T) in mem) : forall (T : Type) (pT : PredType T), pT -> Mem_Pred T Arguments Mem {T}%type_scope {pT}
axioms.dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [w : world s : state |- Type]
getStatelet = fun (s : state) (i : Label) => match find i s with | Some d => d | None => empty_dstatelet end : state -> Label -> dstatelet
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
getProtocol = fun (w : world) (i : Label) => match find i w with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt i end : world -> Label -> protocol
map = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) => fix map (s : seq T1) : seq T2 := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => f x :: map s' end : forall T1 T2 : Type, (T1 -> T2) -> seq T1 -> seq T2 Arguments map {T1 T2}%type_scope _%function_scope _%seq_scope
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Arguments last {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
all = fun (T : Type) (a : pred T) => fix all (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => a x && all s' end : forall T : Type, pred T -> seq T -> bool Arguments all {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
validE : forall (U : pcm) (x y : U), valid (x \+ y) -> valid x * valid y
pleq_validL : forall (U : pcm) (x x1 x2 : U), [pcm x1 <= x2] -> valid (x \+ x2) -> valid (x \+ x1)
pleq_validR : forall (U : pcm) (x x1 x2 : U), [pcm x1 <= x2] -> valid (x2 \+ x) -> valid (x1 \+ x)
validR : forall (U : pcm) (x y : U), valid (x \+ y) -> valid y
validL : forall (U : pcm) (x y : U), valid (x \+ y) -> valid x
consume_valid : forall (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (m : mid), valid s' -> valid (consume_msg s' m)
Coherence.Mixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
pred0v2 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> valid (dsoup d)
pred0v1 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> valid (dstate d)
defPt_defO : forall (A : Type) (h : heap) (x : ptr) (v : A) (f : partition (x :-> v) h), valid f -> valid h
cohVs : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dsoup d)
cohVl : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dstate d)
CPCMMixin : forall U : pcm, (forall x1 x2 x : U, valid (x1 \+ x) -> x1 \+ x = x2 \+ x -> x1 = x2) -> CancellativePCM.mixin_of U
dom_last_key : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid f -> ~~ empb f -> last_key f \in dom f
last_key_dom : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid f -> last_key f \notin dom f -> f = Unit
joinxK : forall (U : cpcm) (x x1 x2 : U), valid (x \+ x1) -> x \+ x1 = x \+ x2 -> x1 = x2
validPtUnV : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (pts k v \+ f) -> valid f
hcancelV : forall (A : Type) (x : ptr) (v1 v2 : A) (h1 h2 : heap), valid (x :-> v1 \+ h1) -> x : -> v1 \+ h1 = x : -> v2 \+ h2 -> [/\ v1 = v2, valid h1 & h1 = h2]
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
mark_other : forall (m m' : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)), valid s' -> (m' == m) = false -> find m' (consume_msg s' m) = find m' s'
Variant mixin_of (U : pcm) : Prop := Mixin : (forall x1 x2 x : U, valid (x1 \+ x) -> x1 \+ x = x2 \+ x -> x1 = x2) -> CancellativePCM.mixin_of U Arguments CancellativePCM.Mixin [U] _%function_scope
cancel : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v1 v2 : V) (f1 f2 : U), valid (pts k v1 \+ f1) -> pts k v1 \+ f1 = pts k v2 \+ f2 -> [/\ v1 = v2, valid f1 & f1 = f2]
valid_fresh' : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (v : V) (i : [ordType of nat]) (w : V), valid (f \+ i \\-> w) -> valid (f \+ fresh (f \+ i \\-> w) \\-> v)
last_keyfUn : forall (V : Type) (f1 f2 : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid (f1 \+ f2) -> last_key f1 <= last_key (f1 \+ f2)

``` 
intros.
unfold Coh, valid, PCM.valid in *.
intros [Hvalidw [Hvalids [Hcomplete [Hdom Hcoh]]]].
exact Hvalids.
```

original: intros. unfold Coh, valid, PCM.valid in *. intros [Hvalidw [Hvalids [Hcomplete [Hdom Hcoh]]]]. apply Hvalids.
